Posts.Content: Ailish wrote: I went to my gp today told her about my family history and that I wanted to get a gene test to see if I had the braca genes. She examined me and said everything felt normal and that I should write down everytime I get breast pain. Now here is the bit I need help with she said I am able to get the gene test. But I have forgotten what its called it began with a T It was very short if someone could help me I would be very great full. I'm from England. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Finally got the courage to go the the doctors Ailish alicki

Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2015 09:37PM Ailish wrote: I think it is the brca1 and brca2 genes. When my mum told me about it she said that we had a personal helpline thing.I want to talk to her about it but I'm worried about her reaction and then what the results are going to be.
Posts.Title: Genetic testing Ailish Moderators

Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2015 09:45PM Ailish wrote: I'm going to call my doctors tomorrow to arrange an appointment. I think talking to a professional will help and maybe I can get some answers.  Thank you.
Posts.Title: Genetic testing Ailish Moderators

Posts.Content: Ailish wrote: My story, my mum and her 2 sisters have had breast cancer. My mum and her twin are both out of remission but my other auntie has had breast cancer three times and she is now about to have 'the big operation'. My mum told me that there is a chance that I could have the two genes that cause breast cancer. However she said I should wait till I'm about thirty to get tested,(I'm nineteen now). Lately it's been on my mind a lot and I want to go and get the test but I'm scared about so many things, like finding out the results then having to deal with that, telling my parents about it all, deciding what to do about it.  However on the other hand I want to put my mind at rest and at least then I will know for now weather I do or don't have it. What would you do? What would you tell your daughters if you were in my mums position?  Thank you for taking the time to read this Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Genetic testing Ailish Moderators
